questions.prompt: Which film contains the quote: "Say 'hello' to my little friend!"

questions.prompt: Which film contains the quote: "What a dump."

questions.prompt: Which film contains the quote: "Mrs. Robinson, you're trying to seduce me. Aren't you?"

questions.prompt: Which film contains the quote: "Of all the gin joints in all the towns in all the world, she walks into mine."
